CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 7, 1956, pg. C3, reads: "The Decks Come On! - Young maids and matrons who are members of the smart Decks Club smile prettily for Teenie Harris during their scintillating cocktail party held Sunday night at Loendi Club. Pictured front: Alma Fox, Jane Williams, and Marion Slater.  Second row: Jean Slater, chairman; Betty Jean Williams, Mildred Bass, Marjorie Pratt, Lee Bosley, Evelyn Anderson and Edna Britton.  Standing: LaRue Frederick, Kay Jones, Thelma Dunning , Ruth Mellix, Shirley Porter, Theresa Evans, Anna Mae English, Norma Duncan, Lois Hall, Vivian Mason, Margaret West, Betty Tibbs and Ida Mae Mauney. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Members of the Decks Club, in front: Alma Speed Fox, Jane Williams, Marion Harris Slater; second row: Jean Slater, Betty Jean Williams, Mildred Bass, Marjorie Pratt, Lee Bosley, Evelyn Anderson, Edna Britton; standing: LaRue Frederick, Kay Jones, Thelma Dunning , Ruth Mellix, Shirley Porter, Theresa Evans, Anna Mae English, Norma Duncan, Lois Hall, Vivian Mason, Margaret West, Betty Tibbs, and Ida Mae Mauney, posed in Loendi Club
